songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
Sabai chau hami yaha khatra
Sabai cha timiharu bachha
Timiharuko rap ekdam kachha
Hamilai sunda lagchha ekdamai lajja
Hamilai sakdainas jitna
Kaile ni hiphop ko beat ma
Boldaichhu timiharuko heetma
Aaija hami sanga timiharu rap sikna


[Verse 1]
Malai chhaina bal
Ma hun tero kaal
Ta jasto koi najanmos tero baulai dinchhu dhaal
Chaina kunai ni sawal
Rap hanchhu ma ekdam babal
Dherai hero naban bhai hoinas ta Rajesh Hamal
Yo ho naya sangeet purano tarika
Mann pari vane vai narisa
Yo ho tero agni parikshya
Vai sakchhas vane garikha

[Chorus]
Sabai chau hami yaha khatra
Sabai cha timiharu bachha
Timiharuko rap ekdam kachha
Hamilai sunda lagchha ekdamai lajja
Hamilai sakdainas jitna
Kaile ni hiphop ko beat ma
Boldaichhu timiharuko heetma
Aaija hami sanga timiharu rap sikna

[Verse 2]
Chaina kehi kami ma mah rap ma tero guruba
Yo khel ko bachha tah class varkhar tero suru vah
Dhyan diyera sun talai gyan mero upahar
We going all like in this bitch like its Sukrabar
Jaile garchhu kaam ma ra mero sathivai
Kukur jati vukeni farak pardaina hatilai
Saan nali bachchu kaile kumchaudina chatilai
Yesta janawar sabai lakhetdai marchu gadimai
Aatinna ma daar ma
Bachdina ma bhar ma
Chaina kohi jhukna sakne adhirajya varma
Rap hanthye ma rahar ma
Finest Kathmandu sahar ma
Aaja autograph ra selfie lina aauchhan mero gharma
Tara chhaina malai parwa para nai chha beglai
Thah hunchha dekhdai
Sablai kafi chhu ma eklai
Badchhu agadi mera dushman harulai chhekdai
Sugam sangit lekhdai
Safalta ko sikhar tekdai

[Chorus] x2
Sabai chau hami yaha khatra
Sabai cha timiharu bachha
Timiharuko rap ekdam kachha
Hamilai sunda lagchha ekdamai lajja
Hamilai sakdainas jitna
Kaile ni hiphop ko beat ma
Boldaichhu timiharuko heetma
Aaija hami sanga timiharu rap sikna
songs.title: Khatra
